title: Production Ownership
desc: I own systems end-to-end. On-call rotations, incident response, and post-mortems are part of my regular workflow—not exceptions.

title: Integration Debugging
desc: Tracing data across NetSuite, QBO, Xero, and internal systems. Finding why a sync failed at 2 AM is something I've done more than once.

title: Calm Under Pressure
desc: P0 incidents don't rattle me. I focus on mitigation first, root cause second, and clear communication throughout.

title: Reliability Engineering
desc: Building systems that fail gracefully. Retries, circuit breakers, alerting, and monitoring are defaults—not afterthoughts.
